You must follow Martin and be followed back to start chatting. Make sure both of you follow each other to unlock chat.

Paintology is a US based software company offering creative digital apps for its users. Our flagship product is the Paintology drawing app available on the Google play store, offering a simple and powerful drawing app for those who enjoy drawing and painting.

His other passion includes art where he has created hundreds of art pieces hanging on the walls of families and friends homes. This drove him to create the digital drawing app, Paintology. It was conceived to allow users to bring much of their traditional art skills to the digital phone and tablet.

 To see his complete works, you can visit his other social sites along with the Paintology.com website.

Paintology is highly committed to protecting your privacy. We want you to spend more time pursuing using our products and services without having to worry about privacy..\n The following privacy statement discloses the information gathering, what we use, and privacy protection practices of this site, Paintology.com.

Like many other Web sites, paintology.com makes use of log files. These files merely log visitors to the site, a standard procedure for hosting companies and a part of hosting service’s analytics. The information inside the log files includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date/time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. This information is used to analyse trends, administer the site, track user’s movement around the site, and gather demographic information. IP addresses, and other such information are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable

The paintology.com website uses cookies to store information about visitors’ preferences, to record user-specific information on which pages the site visitor accesses or visits, and to personalise or customise our web page content based upon visitors’ browser type or other information that the visitor sends via their browser.
 If you wish to disable cookies, you may do so through your individual browser options. More detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers can be found at the browsers’ respective websites. What Are Cookies?
 Our company does not provide third parties with the personal information of users. Personal information provided to third parties”, except in the following cases.
 When the user has given consent in advance.
 When a part of our services is outsourced and it is necessary in order to execute that business.
 When statistical data is disclosed after processing the data so that individuals cannot be identified.
 In instances grounded in law.
 When there is difficulty obtaining the individual’s consent and it is necessary in order to protect a person’s life, person, or property.
 When our company has been asked by a national institution, local government, or one entrusted by said institution or government, to cooperate in disclosing registered content in accordance with the law.
Provision of personal information to third parties
Google Ads (Excluding Paid and Windows versions)

The paintology.com website may contain links to third-party websites, products, widgets and services. You should consult the respective privacy policies of these third-party sites for more detailed information on their practices as well as for instructions about how to opt-out of certain practices, if desired. Google Services The paintology.com website uses various technologies to collect and store general website usage information via Google services. Learn more about Google\'s.

Our company continuously strives to take necessary and appropriate security measures against the dangers of unauthorised access, leaks, destruction, and damage in our handling of personal information.
 Systematic Security Control Measures:
 We maintain a system and rules to protect personal information and are thorough about appropriate handling and responses based on laws and ordinances. We also carry out regular voluntary inspections and audits regarding the circumstances of handling personal information.
 Human Security Control Measures:
 Regularly and when an employee joins the company, we educate all employees on the protection of personal information. In addition, we appropriately direct employees, such as by requiring them to accept the duty to maintain confidentiality based on work regulations.
 Physical Security Control Measures:
 We control an employee’s entry into and exit from rooms in areas where an employee handles personal information. Atthe same time, we implement measures to prevent an unauthorized person from viewing personal information.
 Technical Security Control Measures:
 Due to access control, we limit the extent of viewing and handling information. At the same time, we take technical control measures, such as suitable information security measures against dangers such as illegal access and computer viruses.

You will receive notifications by other users when they like, rate, comment, reply to your post to Gallery and Community.\n\nYou will also receive notifications from the admin of the Paintology app for support and other important notifications.

The Paintology app has been designed to improve your drawing skills while learning through fun and easy tutorials!

The app has been arranged by levels where all users come in at Beginner 1 and work their way up. Just like any school of drawing, you will work your way up by picking up essential and fundamental drawing skills.

Remember, Paintology is not about tools but teaching you core techniques of art that you can apply to any art medium. After all, the fun of painting and drawing is to keep it simple and learn the important techniques. This is how most good artists learn to draw and paint with only a handful of tools. Luckily the same applies to digital drawing. It’s just that many users don’t know the techniques used to make great drawings with just one brush!

The Paintology app has been designed to improve your drawing skills while learning through fun and easy tutorials!

The app has been arranged by levels where all users come in at Beginner 1 and work their way up. Just like any school of drawing, you will work your way up by picking up essential and fundamental drawing skills.

Remember, Paintology is not about tools but teaching you core techniques of art that you can apply to any art medium. After all, the fun of painting and drawing is to keep it simple and learn the important techniques. This is how most good artists learn to draw and paint with only a handful of tools. Luckily the same applies to digital drawing. It’s just that many users don’t know the techniques used to make great drawings with just one brush!

This is what you will learn!

Currently, we don’t have any special accessibility features. However, you should start from the very basics of drawing. Start from the Total Beginner category to get comfortable with your drawing strokes using your finger or a stylus.

The store will be the place where you can unlock even more features of the app! Try to keep it simple and learn in small steps. As you get better, you will find that redeeming those features will help you to tap into more of your creativity.\n\nStart collecting points, so you can redeem some great features of the app. Designed to advance your creativity and not technical skills.

You can get help in several ways.

You can use our new App Support entry form to submit your queries regarding any issues directly from the app.

Alternatively, you can contact us through the web form or directly submitting to the email: support@paintology.com

To get to the App Support screen, click on the image or the button.

Paintology was borne from the mindset of the creator, Dr. Ferdouse Khaleque. Ferdouse has spent most of his life developing state of the art software solutions for major companies like Nike, Sothebys, Harley Davidson and more.

Security and privacy are our top concerns when it comes to our loyal base of users. You can be rest assured that the information that we hold about you is not shared with other third parties. \nOur primary concern is to make sure that users are safe in using the Paintology platform and have the right to cancel, delete any personal information they may feel relevant.
To ensure your data is kept safe, this website is secured and encrypted via privacy communications with Encrypt SSL.
What rights you have over your data & deletion

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us.

 You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you by sending your request through the following contact us form link below.

 Submit the form with your request and you can check back in a week to ensure that all your personal data has been removed from our system.

We believe it is important to provide added protection for children online. We encourage parents and guardians to spend time online with their children to observe, participate in and/or monitor and guide their online activity. Paintology does not knowingly collect any personally identifiable information from children under the age of 13. We advise all children to first get their parents or guardians permission before creating an account for the Paintology Member Area and Forums.
You can also use our new App Support to send your questions and queries.
By using our app, you hereby consent to our privacy policy and agree to its terms.
Permission is necessary to access media and Camera
App version \n\nPlease read these Privacy Policy carefully
